answer: Translation of the prompt: "What is the name of the multi-year research collaboration between an organization known for public opinion surveys (Pew Research Center) and a foundation focused on journalism (Knight Foundation), which aims to study how Americans access civic information and participate in their communities, and under which specific subprojects are conducted within this framework? The Pew-Knight Initiative
ground_truth: Pew Research Center and Knight Foundation联合项目（Pew-Knight Initiative）
